recipe.title: Olive-Orange Vinaigrette
ingredients: 1/3 cup chopped pitted oil-cured black olives
instructions: Mix 1 thinly sliced shallot, 1/3 cup chopped pitted oil-cured black olives, 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 1/4 cup Sherry vinegar, 2 teaspoons finely grated orange zest, 1/4 cup fresh orange juice, and 1 teaspoon coarsely chopped aniseed in a small bowl. Season with kosher salt.

Mix 1 thinly sliced shallot, 1/3 cup chopped pitted oil-cured black olives, 1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 1/4 cup Sherry vinegar, 2 teaspoons finely grated orange zest, 1/4 cup fresh orange juice, and 1 teaspoon coarsely chopped aniseed in a small bowl. Season with kosher salt.
